author: fradamt
content:
I wrote a summary of some of the PeerDAS design decisions discussed at the interop, which imo really simplify it and derisk it: https://notes.ethereum.org/@fradamt/peer-das-design-interop

<@486477492434239488> this might be helpful to see the before and after, at least from a high level design perspective
